content.rendered:
After refusing to complete a particularly dangerous assignment, an assassin finds himself in the crosshairs.

Directed By Martin Campbell

Written By Dario Scardapane. Jef Geeraerts. Carl Joos

Stars: Liam Neeson. Guy Pearce. Taj Atwal
